overview:
Photographic Blogger on Social Media apps.

This Dutch born social media enthousiast, residing in Edinburgh, Scotland, UK is currently employed at Nuance Communications (2011 - ) as an Application Support for Dragon Naturally Speaking and OCR.

Party, People and Portrait Photographer for “Jungleboy Photography” and actively managing several social media fan & company pages (i.e. “Cafe Truva” (all) on Facebook, “Royal Zoological Society Scotland” or RZSS on flickr amongst others)

Indie Film Producer - with Blue Iris Productions for “boat the movie”

Active on twitter, facebook, linkedin, klout, foursquare, orkut, tumblr, flickr, google+, yahoo, tripadvisor, stumbleupon, qype, itaste, skype, ebay, amazon, behance and many many more. - I am trying find ways to incorparate many of these profiles into a few simple to use ‘portal’ (still trying)
